document_data.name: Flatbread
document_data.mainbody: '''Flatbread''' was a common type of [[bread]] found throughout [[Faerûn]],
document_data.Availability:
*In [[Waterdeep]], the City of Splendors, flatbreads were commonly baked for sale in street stalls and their aroma attracted prospect customers.
*In the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] and the [[Western Heartlands]], a certain type of flatbread was called [[pizza]] and it was a round flat base, topped with no fewer than three different cheeses and [[sausage]]. Other flatbreads found in Baldur's Gate (and other large cities, like Waterdeep) included regional varieties from Calimshan, Silverymoon, and Tethyr. Calishite flatbreads were topped with olives and [[pistachio]]s, Tethyrean – with cheese and herbs and consumed with a glass of good wine, and flatbreads from Silverymoon were sugary dessert dishes made with cinnamon.{{Cite archive/Greenwood's Grotto/2023-04-10/Flatbreads in Calimshan and Ruathym}}
*Flatbreads could be found in the town of [[Shadowdale]], as well as in [[Phlan]] and the wider [[Moonsea]], where it was sometimes purchased as part of travelers' provisions alongside [[flour]], [[salt]], [[jerky]], [[dried fruit]], [[sugar]], and [[lard]].
*The dish called [[Three Crabs]] was served on a platter of two toasted flatbread loaves in the [[Singing Sprite]] inn in [[Secomber]]. The flatbreads were smeared with a mixture of chopped greens in white sauce made with [[leek]]s, [[garlic]], [[parsley]], [[vinegar]], and [[egg]] yolks.
*In the ramshackle [[Owlroost Head Inn]] of the [[Amn]]ian town of [[Purskul]], [[shield]]-sized flatbreads were used to serve [[ornabra]] stew. It was drained and wrapped in flatbread, had to be eaten by caravaners on the road.
*[[Butter]]ed flatbreads were a snack available in the merchant nation of [[Sembia]].
*The [[Maid of the Moors]] in the village of [[Longsaddle]] served circular [[fried flatbread]]s as a side of a platter-full of game birds drowned in gravy.
*In [[Aglarond]] of the [[Unapproachable East]], flatbread was eaten topped with berries and nuts.
*[[Calishite]] traveling rations included flatbreads along with [[prune]]s, [[date]]s, dried [[pea]]s, [[goat cheese]], cakes of pounded [[almond]]s, and [[mint]] leaves.
*[[Zakhara]]n flatbreads were served with coked [[rice]] and meats, while most foods were consumed using fingers or via flatbread scooping.
